column2: Can not match with any color.
column3: 不可以与任何颜色匹配。

column2: Embed an item into the gem. It will remove the rune of the gem.
column3: 把道具镶嵌到宝石中。会移除宝石上的符文。

column2: Effect when the cell is eliminated.
Stack and process one by one when the matching stops.
column3: 堆叠起来并在匹配停止时一个接一个地处理。

column2: Effect when the this Item is placed into the board.
column3: 当此道具被放置到棋盘时的效果。

column2: Effect when the this Item is placed into the board. And then the Item will return to Bag.
column3: 当此道具被放置到棋盘时的效果。之后道具会放回到包。

column2: Removed until the end of level.
column3: 直到关卡结束前被移除。

column2: Effect all gems while this Item is on board
column3: 当此道具在棋盘上时，影响所有的宝石。

column2: The cells within the distance of n. 0 means the cell itself.
column3: 距离在n之内的格子。0表示格子本身。

column2: Addition score to each eliminated gem.
column3: 增加额外的分数给消除的宝石。

column2: You can drag this Item to Bag in order to exchange another item.
column3: 你可以将此道具拖拽到包来交换一个新的道具。

column2: Place a satisfied Item to this Item in order to form a combine Item. Basiclly new Item have the effects of both.
column3: 将一个满足条件的道具放到此道具上来组合一个新道具。通常新道具拥有两个道具的效果。

column2: Score and Mult getting from nullified will become 0.
column3: 从无效化中获取的分数跟倍率会变成0。
随机删除%d个棋盘上的宝石。

column2: Out Of Swaps And Not Reach Target Score
column3: 没有交换次数且没有达到目标分数

column2: Gem can have up to 2 enchantments
You can’t have less than %d gems
column3: 你不能拥有低于%d个宝石

column2: You can have up to %d relics
You can’t swap gems in the mist
column3: 你不能交换迷雾中的宝石

column2: You can’t swap gems that have a Sin
column3: 你不能交换拥有罪的宝石

column2: The horizontal cells would be Board Size x6, the vertical cells would be Board Size x2.
column3: 横向的格子数将会是 棋盘大小 x6，纵向的格子数将会是 棋盘大小 x2。

column2: Minimum number of gems required to upgrade Board Size: %d\nMinimum number of gems: %d
column3: 升级棋盘大小所需最少宝石数量：%d\n最少宝石数量：%d

column2: Drop the item here to exchange another item.
column3: 把道具拖拽到这来交换另一个道具。

column2: Roll the board, unpinned and unfrozen gems will be replaced to new ones, then draw new items.
column3: 滚动棋盘，未固定跟未冰冻的宝石会被替换成新的，然后抽取新的道具。

column2: Start matching patterns and get score.
How many fillings were performed during this matching stage.\nWin this level when reaching 60.
column3: 在这次匹配阶段进行过多少次填充。达到60时获得关卡胜利。

column2:
- Drag a gem from Hand to Board to swap them. (You start with 5 Swaps per level)
 - Click the start button to match patterns and score.
 - Only the colors of the gems are used for matching.
 - You pass the level when you reach the target score. When you use up all the Swaps but don’t reach the target score, you lose the game.
column3:
- 从手上拖拽一个宝石到棋盘上来交换。（一开始你每关有5次交换）
 - 点击开始按钮来开始匹配图案并得分。
 - 只有宝石的颜色参与匹配。
 - 当你达到目标分数时，你过关。当你用完所有的交换次数却没有达到目标分数，你游戏失败。

column2: - Gems come with 5 colors[url=gem_red][img]res://images/red.png[/img][/url][url=gem_orange][img]res://images/orange.png[/img][/url][url=gem_green][img]res://images/green.png[/img][/url][url=gem_blue][img]res://images/blue.png[/img][/url][url=gem_purple][img]res://images/purple.png[/img][/url], also [url=w_colorless][img]res://images/colorless.png[/img][/url][url=w_wild][img]res://images/wild.png[/img][/url].\n - Gems can have 3 types of runes[url=rune_destroy][img]res://images/rune_destroy.png[/img][/url][url=rune_wisdom][img]res://images/rune_wisdom.png[/img][/url][url=rune_grow][img]res://images/rune_grow.png[/img][/url], also[url=w_omni][img]res://images/rune_omni.png[/img][/url].\n - Runes do not participate in pattern matching. Specific combinations of runes can be used to activate zodiac signs, such as [url=relic_Leo][img]res://images/relics/leo.png[/img][/url].
column3: - 宝石有5种颜色[url=gem_red][img]res://images/red.png[/img][/url][url=gem_orange][img]res://images/orange.png[/img][/url][url=gem_green][img]res://images/green.png[/img][/url][url=gem_blue][img]res://images/blue.png[/img][/url][url=gem_purple][img]res://images/purple.png[/img][/url]，还有[url=w_colorless][img]res://images/colorless.png[/img][/url][url=w_wild][img]res://images/wild.png[/img][/url]。\n - 宝石可以有3种符文[url=rune_destroy][img]res://images/rune_destroy.png[/img][/url][url=rune_wisdom][img]res://images/rune_wisdom.png[/img][/url][url=rune_grow][img]res://images/rune_grow.png[/img][/url]，还有[url=w_omni][img]res://images/rune_omni.png[/img][/url]。\n - 符文不参与图案的匹配。特定组合的符文可以用于激活星座，例如：[url=relic_Leo][img]res://images/relics/leo.png[/img][/url]。

column2: w_quick: Change gem to red color temporarily.
column3: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为红。

column2: w_quick: Change gem to orange color temporarily.
column3: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为橙。

column2: w_quick: Change gem to green color temporarily.
column3: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为绿。

column2: w_quick: Change gem to blue color temporarily.
column3: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为蓝。

column2: w_quick: Change gem to purple color temporarily.
column3: w_quick：临时改变宝石颜色为紫。

column2: w_quick: Pin the cell and if it is on one or more patterns, pin those cells as well.
column3: w_quick：固定格子并且如果在一个或多个图案中，把那些格子也固定。

column2: w_eliminate: (w_active) Explode and eliminate cells in {range} w_range.
column3: w_eliminate：(w_active) 爆炸并消除{range}w_range内的格子。

column2: w_eliminate by [b]Bomb[/b]: (w_active) Explode and eliminate cells in {range} w_range.
column3: 被炸弹w_eliminate：(w_active) 爆炸并消除{range}w_range内的格子。

column2: w_eliminate: (w_active) Explode and eliminate cells in {range} w_range.\n(If eliminated after 'Chain Bomb', w_range become that 'Chain Bomb's +1, and w_power become that 'Chain Bomb's +2.)
w_eliminate: (w_active) Cost 6 coins to explode and eliminate cells in {range} w_range, earn 0-3 coins for each cell eliminated.
w_quick: Setup a minefield within {setup_range} w_range, and if any cell in that area is eliminated, (w_active)an explosion will occur on that cell and eliminate cells in {range} w_range.
column3: w_quick：在{setup_range}w_range设置地雷阵，如果区域内的格子被消除，(w_active)一个爆炸将会在那个格子发生并消除{range}w_range内的格子。

column2: When an explosion occurs: (w_active) Eliminate 1 random adjacent cell.\nw_eliminate by [b]Bomb[/b]: (w_active) Eliminate cells in {range} w_range.
w_place: Make two copies of this Item into adjacent cells.\nw_eliminate: (w_active) Eliminate all connected cells with the same color of this.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Connect all 'Lightning's, eliminate cells on between.
w_quick: Turn target and 3 random gems to w_wild type until the end of level.
column3: w_quick：使此宝石与3个随机的宝石直到关卡结束前变为w_wild。

column2: w_eliminate: Sets the cell to burning state.
w_eliminate: (w_active) If this is the last item activated. Eliminate all cells.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Eliminate all cells. (Only activate if this is the first item activated.)
w_quick: Target non-w_colorless gem turn to [color=gray][b]Colorless[/b][/color] until the end of level, draw 2 items.
column3: w_quick：使一个非w_colorless宝石直到关卡结束前变为w_colorless，抽2个道具。

column2: w_eliminate: +{value} score for each different Item. (Not affected by combos)
column3: w_eliminate：棋盘上每有一个不同的道具则+{value}分数。（不会受连击影响）

column2: w_eliminate: (w_active) Jump to a cell and eliminate it within 2 w_range. Repeat 2 times.
column3: w_eliminate：(w_active) 跳到一个2w_range内的格子并消除它。重复2次。

column2: w_eliminate: (w_active) Jump to a cell and eliminate it within 2 w_range. If jump to another 'Rabbit', add a new 'Rabbit' to Bag. Repeat 1 time.
w_place: If this item is placed from Bag, place another [color=gray][b]Animal[/b][/color] from Bag to Board.
w_place: Place another [color=gray][b]Animal[/b][/color] from Bag to Board.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Consume a [color=gray][b]Food[/b][/color] on the board, gain score it has.
Turn mounted and this Item into a new Item.
Eliminate all cells this item traveled.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Eliminate a row on a random direction. (Eliminated by 'Iai Cut' will add one direction, Max 3)
When an item is activated, move it to the closest 'Magnet'.

column3: w_eliminate：+{value}分数倍率直到这次匹配结束。

column2: w_aura: All gems +{value} score.\nw_eliminate: (w_active) Gems in 1 w_range -1 base score.
column3: w_aura：宝石+{value}分数。\nw_eliminate：(w_active)1w_range内的宝石基础分数-1。

column2: w_eliminate: (w_active) Turn {number} random gems to w_wild temporarily.
column3: w_eliminate：(w_active) 使{number}个随机的宝石临时地变为w_wild。

column2: w_aura: All gems +7 score.\nw_eliminate: (w_active) Gems in 1 w_range get +1 score permanently.
w_eliminate: (w_active) Turn gems in 1 w_range to Wild until the end of level.
w_quick: Target Item +10 w_power until the end of level.
column3: w_quick：使目标道具直到关卡结束前获得+10w_power。

column2: w_eliminate: (w_active) Eliminate 2 random cells in 2 w_range. Repeat 2 times.
column3: w_eliminate：(w_active)消除2w_range内的2个随机格子。重复2次。

column2: w_eliminate: (w_active) Has different effects depending on how many times [b]Sin Lust[/b] is triggered. 0: Get Score and Mult equal to the Score and Mult already generated. 1: Until the end of this level, the Score and Mult you get become zero. 2: Game over.
column3: w_eliminate：(w_active)根据[b]罪·色欲[/b]的触发次数有不同的效果。1：获得分数与倍率，数值分别等于已经产生的分数与倍率。2：本关结束前获得的分数与倍率为零。3：游戏结束。

column2: When matching finished, if Combos is less than the number of [b]Sin Gluttony[/b], game over.
column3: 匹配完成时若连击数小于[b]罪·暴食[/b]的数量则游戏结束。

column2: w_eliminate: Coins +{value}. If this is the last [b]Jar Of Greed[/b], set the coins to 0.
column3: w_eliminate：金币+{value}，如果这是最后一个[b]贪欲钱罐[/b]，把金币变为0。

column2: w_aura: Score and Mult getting from Gems decrease by 100%.
column3: w_aura：获取自宝石的分数跟倍率减少100%。

column2: Bombs will activate when cells next to are eliminated.
column3: 当旁边的格子被消除时，炸弹会被激活。

column2: Once per level, before the matching ends, perform another rolling and matching, repeat 1 time.
column3: 每关卡一次，在匹配即将完成时，执行一次滚动与匹配，重复1次。

column2: The upper and lower parts of the Board are connected.
column3: 棋盘的上下部分相互链接。

column2: Every 5 Combos, get 5 times Score and Mult in that combo.
column3: 每5个连击，那次连击获得5倍分数与倍率。

column2: Composition with Red, Blue and Yellow

column3: 庞贝与赫库兰尼姆的毁灭

column2: +{value} mult when eliminate a gem with Destroy rune.
column3: 消除破坏符文的宝石时+{value} 倍率。

column2: +{value} mult when eliminate a gem with Grow rune.
column3: 消除生长符文的宝石时+{value} 倍率。

column2: +{value} mult when eliminate a gem with Wisom rune.
column3: 消除智慧符文的宝石时+{value} 倍率。

column2: When matching at least 3 Destroy runes: (w_active) Explode and eliminate cells in {range_i} w_range at {times} random locations.
column3: 当匹配到至少3个破坏符文时：(w_active) 在随机的{times}个位置爆炸并消除{range_i}w_range内的格子。

column2: When matching at least 3 Grow runes: +{value} Score.
column3: 当匹配到至少3个生长符文时：+{value}分数。

column2: When matching at least 3 Wisdom runes: (w_active) Duplicate the left most gem from Hand.
column3: 当匹配到至少3个灵智符文时：(w_active) 复制手中最左边的宝石。

column2: When matching at least 1 Wisdom, and 2 Grow runes: (w_active) Remove 1 curse.
column3: 当匹配到至少1个灵智、和2个生长符文时：(w_active) 移除1个诅咒。

column2: When matching at least 2 Destroy, 1 Wisdom, and 1 Grow runes: +1 Swaps.
column3: 当匹配到至少2个破坏、1个灵智、和1个生长符文时：+1 交换次数。

column2: When matching at least 2 Wisdom, and 1 Grow runes: +{value} Mult.
column3: 当匹配到至少2个灵智、和1个生长符文时：+{value}倍率。

column2: When matching at least 2 Wisdom, and 1 Grow runes:
column3: 当匹配到至少2个灵智、和1个生长符文时：

column2: When matching at least 2 Destroy and 1 Wisdom runes: (w_active) Delete the right most gem from Hand.
column3: 当匹配到至少2个破坏、和1个灵智符文时：(w_active) 删除手中最右边的宝石。

column2: When matching at least 2 Destroy and 1 Wisdom runes: (w_active) Eliminate 1 most valuable gem.
column3: 当匹配到至少2个破坏、和1个灵智符文时： (w_active) 消除1个最有价值的宝石。

column2: When matching at least 1 Destroy, and 2 Grow runes: Coins +{amount}.
column3: 当匹配到至少1个破坏、和2个生长符文时：金币+{amount}。

column2: When matching at least 3 Wisdom runes: (w_active) Select 1 random gem, its Base Score +{value}.
column3: 当匹配到至少3个灵智符文时：(w_active) 选择1个随机宝石，它的基础分数+{value}。

column2: When matching at least 2 Wisdom, and 1 Grow runes: (w_active) Turn 2 random gems into w_wild temporarily.
column3: 当匹配到至少1个灵智、和2个生长符文时：(w_active) 使2个随机宝石临时地变为w_wild。

column2: The price of purchasing gems and relics is halved.
column3: 购买宝石与遗物的价格减半。
